titleInfo.title: Centropentaindan: synthesis and some bridgehead transformations of a novel regular centropolyindan

mods.abstract: The synthesis of a novel centropentacyclic hydrocarbon, centropentaindan 1, has been achieved by fourfold bromination of the readily available difuso-triindan 4 followed by AlBr3-catalysed condensation with two molecules of benzene; functionalization of the two remaining tertiary bridgehead positions of 1 gives the strained, labile dibromide 6, which has been converted into the dimethyl derivative 7, the centrohexacyclic endoperoxide 8, and, again by AlBr3-catalysed condensation with benzene, into centrohexaindan 2.

titleInfo.title: Journal of the Chemical Society, Chemical Communications
